name: post-legalEntities-id-confirmDataReview
description: Confirms that your user has reviewed the data for the legal entity specified in the path. Call this endpoint to inform Adyen that your user reviewed and verified that the data is up-to-date. The endpoint returns the timestamp of when Adyen received the request.

id.description: The unique identifier of the legal entity.

$ul: **dataReviewedAt**: Date when data review was confirmed.
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
